//k m done nao last attempt or else fuck off
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

int main() {
	int N;
	while(scanf("%d",&N)!=EOF)
	{
	int temp = N;
	int flag = 1,rem;
	while(N>0)
	{
	rem=N%10;
	if(rem!=0)
	if(temp%rem!=0)
	{
	flag=0;
	break;
	}
	N/=10;
	}
	if(flag!=0)
	printf("Valid\n");
	else
	printf("Invalid\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
